Package cufy.text

Text is a huge part of any programming language since a lot of data are stored and transferred as text.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Classifier
    A class that can classify sequences from a reader.
    Format
    A class that is a Formatter and Parser and Classifier at the same time.
    Formatter
    A class that can format objects and write it.
    Parser
    A class that can parse a text from a reader to an object.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractFormat
    An abstract class for formatter classes.
    ClassifyToken<T>
    A classification instance that holds the variables of a classification.
    FormatToken<T>
    A formatting instance that holds the variables of a formatting.
    ParseToken<T>
    A parsing instance that holds the variables of a parsing.
    SyntaxTracker
    Helps to track syntax positioning on a stream.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ClassifyException
    Thrown to indicate that the application has attempted to classify a string, but that string does not have the appropriate type.
    FormatException
    Thrown to indicate that the application has attempted to convert an object to a string but that object does not have the appropriate type.
    ParseException
    Thrown to indicate that the application has attempted to convert a string to an object, but that string does not have the appropriate type.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    ClassifyMethod
    Navigate the AbstractFormat class that the annotated method is a string-type-detecting method.
    FormatMethod
    Navigate the AbstractFormat class that the annotated method is a stringing method.
    ParseMethod
    Navigate the AbstractFormat class that the annotated method is a parsing method.

Package cufy.text Description

Text is a huge part of any programming language since a lot of data are stored and transferred as text. But text should be parsed to be able to use it. And data should be formatted to be able to treat it as text. This package provide abstract for how the parsing and formatting process should be done. And also have some text languages formatters and parsers such as JSON.
Since:
09-Jul-2019
Version:
0.1.3
Author:
lsafer
See Also:
framework.cufy.org/site/text
